General.Name: Sino-Ocean Group Holding Limited
General.Description: Sino-Ocean Group Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the property investment and development activities in the People's Republic of China. The company provides property management, commercial operational, community value-added, renovation, consultancy, land development, landscaping, elderly care, and senior housing services, as well as property sales agency and upfitting services. It also develops residential properties; and invests in office premises, shopping malls, commercial complexes, and logistics projects. The company was formerly known as Sino-Ocean Land Holdings Limited and changed its name to Sino-Ocean Group Holding Limited in May 2016. Sino-Ocean Group Holding Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: Ocean International Center, Tower A, Beijing, China

1.Name: Mr. Hongjie  Cui
